name: spo-update-branding-sitelogo-thumbnail
title: Update SharePoint Site Logo and Thumbnail
shortDescription: Update SharePoint Site Logo and Thumbnail.
longDescription: Both site logo and thumbnail are part of SharePoint branding. This script update the site logo and thumbnail across multiple SharePoint sites within a hub which could be an intranet.

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
